mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_ID, USER_PWD, NAME, PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS, ADDRESSDETAIL, LOCATION, EMAIL, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT, STATUS, POINT, TEMPERATURE, KAKAO_IDKEY, NAVER_IDKEY, CATEGORY, BIRTHDAY) VALUES( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, null, '01012345678', 12345, #{address}, '이레빌딩', 1, #{email}, DEFAULT, #{updateAt}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, null, null, 1, #{birthday} )
